RV Accessories Motorhome 12/24V 282 Litre 20 Cubic Feet Refrigerator with Big Freezer Compartment for Caravan Travel Trailer

Keep your food and drinks perfectly chilled on every adventure with the RV Accessories Motorhome 282 Liter Refrigerator. This spacious unit boasts a generous 20 cubic feet of capacity, offering ample room to store all your essentials for a comfortable camping experience.

Designed specifically for RVs, motorhomes, caravans, and travel trailers, this refrigerator operates on both 12V and 24V power sources, ensuring seamless performance whether you're plugged in or off-grid.

  • Spacious Capacity: Store a weeks worth of groceries with ease.
  • Dual Voltage Operation: Compatible with both RV hookups and generator power.
  • Separate Freezer Compartment: Freeze your favorite treats and ice packs for ultimate convenience.

Enjoy the peace of mind knowing your perishables stay fresh and ready to enjoy, wherever your travels take you. The RV Accessories Motorhome 282 Liter Refrigerator is your reliable companion for all outdoor adventures.

This RV refrigerator is designed to keep your food and drinks fresh and cold on the go. It boasts a spacious 282-liter capacity, providing ample room for all your groceries and essentials.

  • Large Capacity: With a generous 282 liters (20 cubic feet) of storage space, this refrigerator offers plenty of room for your food and drinks.
  • Separate Freezer Compartment:
    • A dedicated freezer compartment allows you to freeze ice packs, snacks, and other items, keeping them securely frozen even during travel.
  • 12/24V Operation:
    • This versatile refrigerator can be powered by both 12V and 24V systems, making it compatible with a wide range of RVs, caravans, and trailers.

Voltage: 12V/24V

Capacity: 282 Liters (20 Cubic Feet)

Enjoy the convenience of having a reliable and spacious refrigerator in your RV. The large capacity ensures you can pack enough food for extended trips, while the separate freezer compartment allows you to keep frozen items fresh.

Experience the difference of consistently cold and organized food storage while traveling.

This RV refrigerator is perfect for use in caravans, trailers, RVs, and any other vehicle equipped with a 12V or 24V power source. Simply connect it to your vehicle's electrical system, adjust the temperature settings, and you're ready to go.

For optimal performance, ensure that the refrigerator is level and in a well-ventilated area. Follow the manufacturer's instructions for safe and efficient operation.
